help-file.title: LOOK
help-file.content:
"Look" is used for studying your surroundings and is more often used in its short form variation of "l."
Eg : look l look dragon look at board look board l at board look in bag l in bag l in 2.bag (if you have more than one bag) l south l candle (if there's an extra description of a candle in a room)
Note that if you type "look at <container>" you will not see its contents. To see what's inside a container (e.g., a corpse), use the syntax "look IN <object>." For this type of inspection, it's best to use the command "examine."
"Look" is also used when utilizing one of Duris's many ships, although with different syntax.
